legend: 1. (1,3) down: A heroic champion or paragon of chivalry.. 1. (1,3) across: A resin derived from the sap of various pine trees.. 2. (1,6) across: A large bird of the ocean having a hooked beek and long,narrow wings.. 3. (4,3) down: A smooth chery candy made from suger, butter, cream or milkwith flavoring.. 4. (7,1) down: The dried, orange yellow plant used to as dye and as acooking spice.. 5. (6,2) across: Musical instrument with 46 or more open strings played byplucking.. 6. (9,4) down: A solid cylinder or disk that fits snugly in a larger cylinder and moves under pressure as in an engine.. 7. (4,9) across: An agent, such as yeast, that cause batter or dough to rise.
